title: Road to Philly Bike Expo 2021: Casey Sussman of Junkyard Cats Builds from the Heart
content:
Not long after The Sea Otter Classic made a reappearance, we’re getting closer to the return of the Philly Bike Expo! After being postponed in 2020, the show is scheduled to return on November 6th & 7th, at the PA Convention Center in Philadephia. To celebrate, we’re leading up to the show with our ‘Road

The post Road to Philly Bike Expo 2021: Casey Sussman of Junkyard Cats Builds from the Heart appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
